attribs.name: character_backstory
attribs.current: Born into a cult that worships nightmares and the beasts they can create, Velvet was quickly picked out to be one of the cult's assassin, and induce nightmares in the near by towns. During a riutal one dark night, when the cult attempted to bring nightmarish beings into the world, a strange cat like creatures interrupted the ritual, and with the cult masters deep in sleep not able to defend them selves the ritual failed. After that night Velvet found her nights a peaceful sleep, and wondered if it was due to the cat like creatures, and went into the cult's archives to find more. Now with the knowledge that the creature is attracted by nightmares, though more mundane ones, Velvet set out to see if she could not meet the creature that allowed her peaceful sleep.

attribs.name: repeating_proficiencies_-LcF4nY-5smENLfd7i3a_name
attribs.current: Common, Elven, Abyssal, Dwarven, Thieves' cant

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcH-u3xfT7dB89tw1ig_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Piercing

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcH-xvaD7MnluixoC0F_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

If you use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a melee attack, you treat the weapon as an improvised weapon (see "Improvised Weapons" later in the section). A sling must be loaded to deal any damage when used in this way.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcH-xvaD7MnluixoC0F_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Ranged Weapon, Damage: 1d6, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 80/320

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcH-zJIBObpAZPp2YFX_itemcontent
attribs.current: A quiver can hold up to 20 arrows.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcH0-dZkXRYZXBM7f68_itemcontent
attribs.current: Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcH0ChZeoLayiuoD-Co_itemcontent
attribs.current: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcH0F4spuhLqEpFDIZd_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Includes:

• a backpack

• a bag of 1,000 ball bearings

• 10 feet of string

• a bell

• 5 candles

• a crowbar

• a hammer

• 10 pitons

• a hooded lantern

• 2 flasks of oil

• 5 days rations

• a tinderbox

• a waterskin

• 50 feet of hempen rope

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcH0HIhn-FAPdWSytUe_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d4, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 20/60

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcH0JO8R5B3kfLKsi1p_itemcontent
attribs.current: This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers. Proficiency with these tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to disarm traps or open locks.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LcF4xMjWr2RjupJoMdU_description
attribs.current: You know the secet symbolgy of your cult, witch use by members to identify themselves to fellow adherents. Some influestial perosons or townsfolk may be members of your cult, and with subtle gestures or hand sign you can discern who follows the way of your dark patron. Cloisters of your cuilt may be hidden in different towns. Theses signs can identify such closisters, and if they are still active adherents there may feel obliged to provide you and your companions with food and lodging,

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LcH1eRgtORjG3OEInW8_description
attribs.current: Thanks to your elf blood, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LcH1iJ1kUOXBuaczy7p_description
attribs.current: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcH2DYgaOW0qXlYRcXA_itemcontent
attribs.current: A cloth or leather pouch can hold up to 20 sling bullets or 50 blowgun needles, among other things. A compartmentalized pouch for holding spell components is called a component pouch. A pouch can hold up to 1/5 cubic foot or 6 pounds of gear.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcH2KEiZwMfUeaW-OTs_itemcontent
attribs.current: A poisoner’s kit includes the vials, chemicals, and other Equipment necessary for the Creation of Poisons. Proficiency with this kit lets you add your proficiency bonus to any Ability Checks you make to craft or use Poisons.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: I will find the nightmare eater, for better or worst

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: Terror: If you can not survive the nightmares in your head you can surive the real world

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current:
Murder was significantly less frowned upon by the cult
than it is in the outside world.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current:
Poeple need to stop treating "dreams" and "goals" as the same thing.
I try my best not to wake someone up inless it is needed, or I am asked to.
